decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted therewith (PP_01 received 14/10/14, CGI image received 17/4/14, 038-02 received 24/4/14, and 038-03 received 12/5/14) and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The shopfront shall be replaced in accordance with the details of the approved drawings within 3 months of the date of this permission.

Condition : 4 - The glass display window to the shopfront shall not be replaced with obscured/ translucent glass and a display area visible to the public, partitioned from the remainder of the ground floor, shall be permanently maintained as per the approved drawings.
description: Retrospective permission for the change of use of the ground floor and basement from existing restaurant (A3 use) to sui generis use with alteration to shopfront.
